Affiliation: House Clegane /

Name: Gregor Clegane, Mounted Behemoth

-Brynden Tully

Name: Khal Drogo, The Great Khal
Quote: "The Dothraki follow only the strong."

Name: Jorah Mormont, Westerosi Tactician
Quote: "I vow to serve you, to obey you, to die for you if need be. Whatever may come."

Name: Jorah Mormont, The Exiled Knight
Quote: "I did things it shames me to speak of... In the end it cost me all."

Name: Screamer Ko
Requirement Text: *May only be Attached to Targaryen units.*

Name: Outrider Ko
Requirement Text: *May only be Attached to Targaryen units.*

Name: Barristan Selmy, The Bold
Quote: "I am a knight. I shall die a knight."

Name: Belwas, Veteran Pit-Fighter
Quote: "Bad fighting, good dying. Strong Belwas hates it when they scream."

Name: Jorah Mormont, Penitent Betrayer
Abilities:
Whatever May Come /
Must be attached to 'Daenerys Targaryen'
Requirement Text: *Jorah may only be attached to a unit containing Daenerys Targaryen. He ignores the usual attachment limits.*
Quote: "He lied to me, informed on me, but he loved me too, and he always gave good counsel."

Name: Jorah Mormont, The Andal
Abilities:
Order: Martial Training /
Stand Your Ground!
Quote: "There is a savage beast in every man, and when you hand that man a sword or spear and send him forth to war, the beast stirs."

Name: Belwas, The Strong
Quote: "I let each man cut me once, before I kill him. Count the cuts and you will know how many Strong Belwas has slain."

Name: Grey Worm, Unsullied Commander
Quote: "I don't make peace with the queen's enemies. I kill the queen's enemies."

Name: Grey Worm, Freed by the Dragon
Quote: "Grey Worm is the name this one drew the day Daenerys Stormborn set him free."

Name: Daenerys Targaryen, Mother of Dragons
Quote: "I am the blood of the dragon. If they are monsters, so am I."

Name: Daenerys Targaryen, Queen of Meereen
Abilities:
Order: Threaten/
Intimidating Presence /
The Rightful Queen
Quote: "Why do the gods make kings and queens, if not to protect the ones who can't protect themselves?"

Name: Daario Naharis, Reckless Mercenary
Quote: "I count no day as lived unless I have loved a woman, slain a foeman, and eaten a fine meal."

Name: Daario Naharis, Stormcrow Captain
Abilities:
Affiliation: Stormcrows /
Improved Armaments /
Motivated by Coin
Quote: "He has a sellsword's conscience, That is to say, none at all."

Name: Rakharo, Bloodrider
Quote: "As you say, I do, blood of my blood."

Name: Qotho, Bloodrider
Abilities:
Bloodrider/
Intimidating Presence/
Prey On Fear
Requirement Text: *May not be fielded in an army that includes the "Drogo's Bloodriders" unit.*

"The Dothraki say a man and
his bloodriders share one life..."

Name: Cohollo, Bloodrider
Requirement Text: *May not be fielded in an army that includes the "Drogo's Bloodriders" unit.*
Quote:
"They were the khal's brothers,
his shadows, his fiercest friends."

Name: Haggo, Bloodrider
Requirement Text: *May not be fielded in an army that includes the "Drogo's Bloodriders" unit.*
Quote:
"'Blood of my blood', Drogo called them,
and so it was; they shared a single life."

Name: Mirri Maz Duur, Resentful Healer
Requirement Text: *Mirri ignores the usual Attachment limits.*
Quote: "You knew the price."

Name: Marselen, Unsullied Captain

"It's their discipline that makes them
dangerous" -Tyrion Lannister

Name: Skahaz Mo Kandaq, Merciless Ghiscari
Quote:
"The Shavepate would feed them
to your dragons, it is said."

Name: Skahaz Mo Kandaq, The Shavepate
Quote:
"We will rue your old man’s honor before this
game is done." -Skahaz to Barristan Selmy

Name: Marselen, Mother's Men Commander
Quote:
"The Unsullied have something better
than strength... They have discipline."

Abilities:
Boisterous Charisma /

Stubborn Tenacity

Name: Asha Greyjoy, Captain of the Black Wind

Name: Victarion Greyjoy, The Iron Captain

Name: Victarion Greyjoy, Master of the Iron Victory

Limited: *Your army may only include up to 2 Reaver Captains.

Name: Theon Greyjoy, Kinslayer

Name: Theon Greyjoy, "Prince" of Winterfell
Quote: "Your lord father did what he could to gentle Theon, but I fear it was too little and too late..."

Name: Qarl, Asha's Champion
Requirement Text: *This Attachment ignores the usual Attachment limits when added to a unit containing Asha Greyjoy.*
Quote: “If you liked the Shadow so well, go back there,” -Qarl to Euron Greyjoy

Name: Qarl, The Maid

Name: Nute, The Barber

Victarion's Vassal/ 
Furious Charge / 
Motivated by Coin
Quote: "Glory is good, but gold is better."

Name: Euron Greyjoy, Lord Reaper of Pyke
Quote: "Balon was mad, Aeron is madder, and Euron is the maddest of them all."

Name: Balon Greyjoy, The Kraken King
Abilities:
Fueled By Slaughter / 
The Kraken's Dues
Quote: "I pay the iron price. I will take my crown, as Urron Redhand did five thousand years ago."

Name: Euron Greyjoy, Crow's Eye
Quote: "I am the storm, my lord. The first storm, and the last."

Name: Erik Ironmaker, Anvil-Breaker
Abilities:
Order: Divide The Spoils / 
Gifts of Silver and Bronze
Quote: "King Erik, aye, I like the sound o' that. Come, say it with me. ERIK! ERIK ANVIL-BREAKER! ERIK KING!"

Name: Asha Greyjoy, "Lady Greyjoy"
Quote: "I am Asha of House Greyjoy, aye. Opinions differ on whether I'm a lady."

Name: Dagmer Cleftjaw, Captain of the Foamdrinker
Quote: "His hair is white and his teeth are rotten, but he still has a taste for glory."

Name: Baelor Blacktyde, Captain of the Nightflyer
Quote: "Balon the Widowmaker, I call him. I will gladly trade his freedom for a father. Have you one to give?"

Name: Moqorro, Slave of R'hllor
Requirement Text: *If your army contains Victarion Greyjoy, Master of the Iron Victory, reduce the cost of Moqorro, Slave of R'hllor by 1.*
Quote: "The Lord of Light has shown me your worth, lord Captain. Every night in my fires I glimpse the glory that awaits you."

Name: Baelor Blacktyde, Lord of Blacktyde
Quote: "Lord Blacktyde says this kingsmoot is a dangerous folly... " -Rodrik Harlaw

Name: Dagmer Cleftjaw, Master-at-Arms
Quote: "The living should smile, for the dead cannot."

Name: Drowned Prophet

Coordinated Assault /

Boldness and Courage

Name: Ramsay Snow, Spiteful Heir

Name: Roose Bolton, Lord of the Dreadfort

Name: Ramsay Snow, Sadist

Name: Theon Greyjoy, Reek
Abilities:

Requirement Text: *May only be fielded in an army that includes Ramsay Snow, and must be attached to his unit, ignoring usual Attachment limits.*

Name: Ben Bones, Kennelmaster
Requirement Text: *Reduce this Attachment's cost by 1 if attached to a unit of Bastard's Girls.*

he may name his next litter after them."

Name: Damon Dance-For-Me, Bastard's Boy

Name: Skinner, Bastard's Boy
Requirement Text: *The first Bastard's Boy Attachment included in your army is free.*

Name: Grunt, Bastard's Boy

Name: Sour Alyn, Bastard's Boy

Quote: "Grunt had no tongue and Sour Alyn had no wits, Lord Ramsay liked to say."

Pathfinder

Name: Lem Lemoncloak, The Lemon

Not: 'Beric Dondarrion'
Rules: 51102

Name: Edric Dayne, Loyal Squire
